name: City Gangs: San Andreas
description:
How to play

Your goal is to destroy your opponents' armies and have more followers than anyone else!

- Recruit from anywhere on the city map
- Steal away followers from other players to reduce their numbers
- Become the head of an army of hundreds

Gameplay:
- A dynamic virtual world
- Tons of skins
- Super simple controls

Remember! No matter how big your army, never break from the crowd, or you'll lose every last followers you've got!
